name: Are You Old Enough To Play This Game - A Parody
name_original: Are You Old Enough To Play This Game - A Parody
description:
A game "celebrating" classic old-school games that had you hunt for answers in the manual just so you could start playing. Fun, FUN stuff. They would even require you to answer some trivia just to prove you were the right age to play the game.

Comes with a manual, that you must use. You may also find that the internet is a useful source of information.

A game made over the course of 100 hours for the Extra Credits Game Jam #5

Extra Credit Challenges Done
Extra Media
Extra CGA
Extra Diegetic UI
Extra Zoey

How To Play
Download the manual (You'll need it)
Turn on the computer to launch the game
Hit keys A/B/C/D when prompted for answers
You can also toggle power for the speaker by hitting the speaker button

Made By
Achintya Bisht
Ujwal Kumar
